name: Miniris - topdown Shmup planes SET + KIT 32x32
name_original: Miniris - topdown Shmup planes SET + KIT 32x32
description:
Free content: KIT

  • Fuselage (main body) - 23
  • Front wings - 21
  • Rear wings - 28
  • wind shields - 12

Paid content: SET

  • 90 planes made from mix and matching the free KIT content
  • You can do everything made here by yourself with the free KIT provided. This is just an option made available if you want to support my work. :)

What is Miniris?

  • Miniris is a series I'll be making content of from now on. And this is the first of them!
  • Is a pixel art asset series. Most, if not all assets in this series will be compatible with each other.
  • Miniris design guidelines:
    • Max 3-4 colors for each object.
    • Minimal textures applied
    • Palette: res64 by KerrieLake

Will I update this? - If there is strong demand for it, for sure!

Questions? Something wrong with the asset? Please let me know! :D

IMPORTANT: By downloading the files provided, you agree to the Asset License Agreement that defines the Assets' Terms of Use.

 License Overview

  • You can use assets for commercial and non-commercial purposes.
  • You can use the assets till the end of time.
  • You can use the assets on any number of projects.
  • You CANNOT resell or redistribute these assets (modified or raw) as your own.
    • (This is basically really the BIGGEST NO!)
  • You cannot make these assets (modified or raw) available for use to the end user of your project.
    • e.g. game/app, education, website, etc.
      • A project that uses the asset (or part of the asset) as a graphical object in any manner is allowed.
      • A project where the end users will be able to save/export and/or access/edit the raw/modified version of the asset itself is NOT allowed.
  • You cannot use the assets on printed media of any form.
    • e.g. paper, t-shirts, mugs, canvas, wood etc.
  • Credit is not required but EXTREMELY appreciated. In fact, I will try to keep up & make a link back to your project in this asset store and my socials.
    • Here's a google form so i could keep track of you guys. This will help keep my end of the bargain. :)
  • If you choose to give me credit, you can do it in any manner or form inside the project upon use of any one or more of the purchased assets.
  • If you need some clarifications, just let me know :)
